message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SP, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.SI. 

The paper proposes a verification-based decoding approach for reconstruction of a sparse signal with incremental sparse measurements, which is a problem in compressed sensing. Therefore, cs.IT (Information Theory) and cs.SP (Signal Processing) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also discusses the sparsity of the signal, which is a common topic in cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.MM (Multimedia). Finally, the paper proposes an efficient approach for reconstruction, which can be considered as a methodological contribution and may fit into cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
